sentences.en: Aloe may have an analgesic effect on inflammation and minor skin irritations.
sentences.cn: 芦荟可能对发炎以及轻微的皮肤炎症具有镇痛作用。

sentences.en: Analgesic Substance from The Anamorph of Cordyceps gunnii ( Berk. ) Berk.
sentences.cn: 古尼虫草Cordycepsgunnii ( Berk. ) Berk. 无性型的镇痛物质研究(英文)
阿司匹林是药性平和的止痛药。
阿司匹林是药性平和的止痛药.

sentences.en: But acetaminophen is a fairly weak analgesic, experts say.
sentences.cn: 但专家认为，对乙酰氨基酚的镇痛效果不强。

sentences.en: Conclusion: Bagmaking Tea of Sanyaku possessed anti - inflammatory , analgesic and antipyretic effects.
sentences.cn: 结论: 三丫苦泡茶具有良好的解热、 抗炎 、 镇痛作用.

sentences.en: Ginger Tea - Ginger, being a natural analgesic and antipyretic, can help reduce your fever and its effects.
sentences.cn: 姜茶 ——姜，作为一种天然的止痛剂和退热剂，可以帮助退热和减轻由此引起的其他症状。

sentences.en: If approved, the FDA said Cymbalta would be the first nontraditional analgesic approved for chronic pain.
sentences.cn: FDA称，如果欣百达获得批准，它将是第一个非传统慢性疼痛止痛药。

sentences.en: Methods Analgesic effect in mice was observed by body - torsion and hot - plate method.
sentences.cn: 方法用小鼠热板法和扭体法观察其镇痛作用.

sentences.en: Objective : To observe antipyretic - analgesic and anti - inflammatory effects of Banlangen Buccal Tablets ( BBTs ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察 板蓝根 含片的解热镇痛及 抗炎 作用.

sentences.en: Objective : To study anti - inflammatory , analgesic, antipruritic and anti - trichomonal effects of Zihua Lotion.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察紫花洗剂的 抗炎 、 镇痛和止痒、 抗 滴虫作用.

sentences.en: Objective Compare N 2 O with disoprofol in analgesic of artificial abortion operation.
sentences.cn: 目的比较笑气与异丙酚在人流术中的镇痛效果.

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the antipyretic, analgesic and antiinflammatory effects of xiaoerkanggan granular.
sentences.cn: 目的观察小儿抗感颗粒的解热 、 镇痛、抗炎作用.

sentences.en: Objective To observe analgesic effect of diprovan and tramadol in induced abortion.
sentences.cn: 目的观察异丙酚与曲吗多在人工流产中的应用效果.

sentences.en: The analgesic effect, effect and vital signs after applying PCA were recorded.
sentences.cn: 记录比较行自控镇痛后的镇痛效果 、 副反应及生命体征情况.

sentences.en: The hospital advised an analgesic for chest and shoulder pains.
sentences.cn: 医院建议用止痛药治疗胸部和肩部疼痛。

sentences.en: This cream contains a mild analgesic to soothe stings and bites.
sentences.cn: 这种乳膏含有一种性能平和的止痛剂,能缓解被螫咬后的疼痛.

sentences.en: What are the analgesic effects of alpha 2 agonists?
sentences.cn: 2受体激动剂的镇痛作用是什么?
